text: Bhai! Freshers me sabke maje lene se lekar final year me "bina soche kar", we did a lot silly things together. Ye sab possible hi na hota agar apan itna vibe na karte hote. I will miss the way we use to vibe and that perfect ass. Peace \/
author: Dikshant  Sachan

text: Final year me tune randi rona kam kar diya bhai, bahot miss kiya tera randi rona maine. Abhi jab bhi koi subah subah gaane bajata hai to teri hi yaad aati hai. Tu punjab ki dictionary hai bhai, mai terese hi har punjab ki chij clarify krta tha jo mujhe samajh nhi aati thi. Tu bahot helpful banda hai yaar, thanks for all the help.
author: Dikshant  Sachan

text: Chandra bhaiya wo first year ki paani waali ladayi epic thi apni. Bluetooth speaker lane wali bet haara tha tu yaad hai aur quad me nanga naach abhi tak nahi kiya tune uske liye. Teri maje lene me bahot maja aata tha bhai. I will miss you bro.
author: Dikshant  Sachan

text: Meme Lord Dewansh! In 4 saalo me ye samajh aaya ki tu ek chhota sa bachcha hai giant body me. Tere playlists bahot hi wierd hoti hain lekin firbhi achi lagti hain. You are like a guy who makes his own path rather than following others. Keep it up boy. Aur ha "udhar dekh bandar hai waha".
author: Dikshant  Sachan

text:
Apan log sutte ka logistics ache se handle karte hain.
PS. Ek ek peg aur bana
author: Dikshant  Sachan

text: From "siyaram" to "** ki ** me danda" to "mujhe chadhti nahi", from first puke of bhindi to your last puke I saw you grow. I consider myself lucky of being a witness to your changing life. Aur ha aero project ka brief dete rehna future me bhi, I will need it for my resume.
author: Dikshant  Sachan

text: First year k madhur se kab hardcore madhur ban gaya tu samajh hi nahi aaya. Sutte se bahot nafrat hai tujhe lekin tujhe pata nahi hoga tune bahot sutta funka hai bhandi me. Aise hi sabko maarte rahna US me bhi. Tau ji aisa mat sochna ki ab udhaar nahi dega padega mujhe, ledger will go on.
author: Dikshant  Sachan

text: First year se constant friends. From doing aero project to going to patri to counteless movie days to tripping together, it is like we grew together like brothers. We had fights all just because tu jyada funkta tha bsdk. You were always the go to person during my low times.
author: Dikshant  Sachan

text: Countless movie days, study sessions, bulla sessions, bullying sessions and parties, you were always there. We are the duo who can bully literally anyone. It is just not possible to fit everything in this memoir so i will just mention the key terms. NCL nightouts, patri, suro k sasur, doaa canteen, intern days, cheating in group, acid, and many more. Also Dikshant Sachan from P&D pvt. ltd. signing off                   until Bangalore.
author: Dikshant  Sachan

text: It started off with some childish fights, I used to cover you up with your quilt and give you some thumps. Thanks for arranging the notes for me, thanks for all the help in exams also thanks for all the coffee. Tere paas har chij kaise hoti hai just to mention one, 9 amp ka fuse bhi tha tere paas jab mujhe jarurat thi.  You are Doraemon to my Nobita.
author: Dikshant  Sachan

text: Hours and hours of gaming sessions, bulla sessions, party sessions, politics sessions, movie times and "doing nothing together just sitting" times. You are a game changing person in my life, there are countless things I did which I had never imagined before. Subah jagna seekh le bas kyuki tereko koi dusra insaan nahi jaga sakta.
author: Dikshant  Sachan
